search.text1: To find a piece, simply enter the criteria of the piece you want to find and then select the upload icon. If there is a match, Pitric AI will list the top matches and this dialog box will close automatically.
search.text2: You can then select the piece you want, and Pitric AI will insert the piece in the document at the location of the cursor, or you can delete it. If Pitric AI does not list the piece you are looking for, modify the search criteria.
search.text3: You can also close the dialog box by selecting the dismiss icon. When you do this, Pitric AI will not search for any pieces.

add.text1: To add a piece, simply select the part of the document that will become the piece and add a name and an optional description. Then select the upload icon. You can make the piece private—where only you can access it—or public—where the entire organization can access it.
add.text2: You can also close the dialog box by selecting the dismiss icon. When you do this, Pitric AI will not add the piece.
add.tip1: The upload icon adds the piece to the cloud and closes the dialog box.
add.tip2: The dismiss icon closes the dialog box and does not add the piece to the cloud.
add.tip3: The private switch toggles between private and public pieces.
add.tip4: The piece name is required and is between three and thirty characters.
add.tip5: The piece description is optional and cannot exceed 230 characters.

send.text1: To send pieces to your contacts, simply select the pieces you want to send and the contacts that will receive them. Then select the upload icon to send the pieces.
send.text2: You can also close the dialog box by selecting the dismiss icon. When you do this, Pitric Pieces will not send any pieces.
send.tip1: The upload icon sends the selected pieces to the selected contacts and closes the dialog box.
send.tip2: The dismiss icon closes the dialog box and does not send any pieces.

settings.text1: To change the settings simply modify the settings and then select the upload icon to set your settings. Your new settings will become your default settings and the next time you open Pitric Pieces, they will be set.
settings.text2: In settings, you can change the size of the font, set the theme and the language. You can set whether instructions and tooltips are displayed. Note: To set a Hight Contrast Theme, set the accessibility option in your device.
settings.text3: You can also close the dialog box by selecting the dismiss icon. When you do this, Pitric Pieces will not save your settings as defaults.
settings.tip2: The language switch toggles between English and Spanish.
settings.tip3: The instructions switch toggles between instructions and no instructions.
settings.tip4: The theme switch toggles between light and dark themes. To set a high contrast theme, set the accessibility option in your device.
settings.tip5: The tooltips switch toggles between tooltips and no tooltips.
settings.tip6: The text radio buttons set the size of the text: small, medium, or large.
settings.tip7: The upload icon sets your new settings as your defaults and closes the dialog box.
settings.tip8: The dismiss icon closes the dialog box and does not set your new settings as your defaults.

text.text1: To change the settings simply modify the settings and then select the upload icon to set your settings. Your new settings will become your default settings and the next time you open Pitric Pieces, they will be set.
text.text2: In settings, you can change the size of the font, set the theme and the language. You can set the details of searches and whether instructions and tooltips are displayed. Note: To set a Hight Contrast Theme, set the accessibility option in your device.
text.text3: You can also close the dialog box by selecting the dismiss icon. When you do this, Pitric Pieces will not save your settings as defaults.

theme.caption1: Note: To set a Hight Contrast Theme, set the accessibility option in your device.
theme.text1: To change the theme, simply slide the switch and then select the upload icon to set it as your default theme. You can make the theme light or dark. If the screen is set in contrast theme, Pitric AI inherits it and overrides the light or dark theme.
theme.text2: To set a contrast theme in Windows 11, you select the Start button and then select Settings > Accessibility > Contrast themes. In Windows 10, you select the Start button and then select Settings > Ease of Access > Display. On a Mac, you choose the Apple menu and then select Systems Settings >  Accessibility > Display.
theme.text3: You can also close the dialog box by selecting the dismiss icon. When you do this, Pitric AI will not set it as your default theme.

language.text1: To change the language, simply slide the switch and then select the upload icon.to set it as your default language. There are two languages to choose from: English, and Spanish.
language.text2: You can also close the dialog box by selecting the dismiss icon. When you do this, Pitric AI will not set it as your language.

ribbon.tip1: The swap icon toggles the ribbon contents between Pieces and Contacts.

tip.text1: The swap icon toggles the ribbon contents between Pieces and Contacts.
tip.text2: The language switch toggles between English and Spanish.
tip.text3: The instructions switch toggles between instructions with tooltips and no instructions or tooltips.
tip.text4: The theme switch toggles between light and dark themes. To set a high contrast theme, set the accessibility option in your device.
tip.text5: The search results switch toggles between verbose and concise results when searching pieces.
tip.text6: The text radio buttons set the size of the text: small, medium, or large.
tip.text7: The upload icon sets your new settings as your defaults and closes the dialog box.
tip.text8: The dismiss icon closes the dialog box and does not set your new settings as your defaults.
